location1: ['Dubai StarDubai, Jumeirah Lake Towers, Lake Almas West']
descriptions:
['DescriptionAQUA Properties is proud to present this amazing 1-bedroom+Study apartment located in Preatoni Tower, Jumeirah Lakes Towers (JLT), Cluster L. Located on a high floor, it features stunning lake views and ample natural light due to excessive use of glass. The apartment, spanning over 1,211 square feet built-up area, comes with a covered parking space.
* 1 Bedrooms+ Study                                                                          
* BUA: 1,211 sq.ft.                                                                             
* 2 Bathrooms                                                                          
* Lake views                                                                                                                                                   
* Unfurnished                                                                                                                                       
* 1 Parking space                                                                                                                                        
* Open plan kitchen                                                                                                                           
Facilities and amenities: 
* 24/7 Maintenance                                                                                                                    
* Parking                                               
* 2 Swimming pools
* Gym
* Business centre
* Walking trails
Preatoni Tower, ex Dubai Star, was launched in 2006. Upon the financial crisis construction work was held, Preatoni took over the distressed project in 2014 and was able to revive it. It features 554 mixed-use units including studios, 1, 2 and 4-bedroom apartments with chic design, high-end finishing, and ample spaces. The layout and the interiors are following the contemporary architectural approach with wide windows opening to impeccable vistas of the surrounding ambience.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionThis is a great investment opportunity with rental income; a fully furnished, immaculate and spacious one bedroom apartment in the sought after Jumeirah Beach Residence community that comes with an amazing Marina view and a balcony.  This charming 18th floor apartment in Bahar 6 overlooks the Marina from the balcony. Bahar 6 is an ideal location to rent as it offers its residents a well established community with beach access, swimming pools and The Walk with its countless restaurants, coffee shops, boutiques and convenience stores. It has easy access to the metro, as well as Sheikh Zayed Road and Beach Road. This apartment comes with one basement parking.  Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR) is a beautiful beach-facing residential and commercial community built in the Dubai Marina area and measures 1.7 kms of pristine coastline. The six residential clusters include Shams, Amwaj, Rimal, Bahar, Sadaf and Murjan. Contact Betterhomes now to arrange a viewing for this property!']
